2ce2f632f0e054ad988db89c5ea280425fd765d5.summary: Remove too greedy GCOV ignores from `.gitignore`
2ce2f632f0e054ad988db89c5ea280425fd765d5.body:
This would cause `updown.png` to be ignored in our default theme in 3.x.

These ignores were added in #36800 for #36572 (see that PR for usage
instructions).

From a quick test, using `--output-file` for `lcov` and `--output-directory`
for genhtml let us output the files in a way that won't conflict with the
Git repository (e.g. in `bin/`, or outside the Git repo).

(cherry picked from commit 5c38e4216174f21362058a1a77938f5a63e2ffef)

5c38e4216174f21362058a1a77938f5a63e2ffef.summary: Remove too greedy GCOV ignores from `.gitignore`
5c38e4216174f21362058a1a77938f5a63e2ffef.body:
This would cause `updown.png` to be ignored in our default theme in 3.x.

These ignores were added in #36800 for #36572 (see that PR for usage
instructions).

From a quick test, using `--output-file` for `lcov` and `--output-directory`
for genhtml let us output the files in a way that won't conflict with the
Git repository (e.g. in `bin/`, or outside the Git repo).

bf2d62382f63797d108644ed9adc043062339a36.summary: Fix infinite loop on EOF in the command line debugger
bf2d62382f63797d108644ed9adc043062339a36.body:
When using the command line debugger (godot -d) on Unix systems, when
entering an EOF (ctrl+D), the debugger enters an infinite loop.

Adding a check for EOF in the debugger loop exits the debugger when EOF
is entered.

Fixes #50170.

(cherry picked from commit 4ecad8dea30859a5acbac41fe0e647c7bb6a53cc)
(cherry picked from commit d1dcea79d4935589a003e0f16fa02646ceb6cfb6)

When using the command line debugger (godot -d) on Unix systems, when
entering an EOF (ctrl+D), the debugger enters an infinite loop.

Adding a check for EOF in the debugger loop exits the debugger when EOF

Fixes #50170.

03b2b23ef8bff8c193911a16077c989b32c73b41.summary: Linux: Don't use udev for joypad hotloading when running in a sandbox
03b2b23ef8bff8c193911a16077c989b32c73b41.body:
udev doesn't work in sandboxes, notably the new Steam container runtime
as found notably on the Steam Deck, and in Flatpak/Snap packages.

Like SDL does, when we detect such a containerized environment, we fall
back to parsing `/dev/input` directly.
See smcv's comments in #76879 for details.

Fixes #76879.

(cherry picked from commit 788cb74cc676627b6c9b7e29a47200141cca92ff)
(cherry picked from commit 8a23fa41a86e825ae6f0cbec7346239885c6dab5)

8a23fa41a86e825ae6f0cbec7346239885c6dab5.summary: Linux: Don't use udev for joypad hotloading when running in a sandbox
8a23fa41a86e825ae6f0cbec7346239885c6dab5.body:
udev doesn't work in sandboxes, notably the new Steam container runtime
as found notably on the Steam Deck, and in Flatpak/Snap packages.

Like SDL does, when we detect such a containerized environment, we fall
back to parsing `/dev/input` directly.
See smcv's comments in #76879 for details.

Fixes #76879.

2e8e7b8b79b756de5f8576361737138379c5bef5.summary: GDScriptParser - don't use index operator on linked list
2e8e7b8b79b756de5f8576361737138379c5bef5.body:
Index operators are super slow with linked lists. This came up in profiling the parsing, iterating sequentially using iterator is much faster.

(cherry picked from commit ef914dac31f23fb8bd4c5e498a68ebd4ca4e1430)

ef914dac31f23fb8bd4c5e498a68ebd4ca4e1430.summary: GDScriptParser - don't use index operator on linked list
ef914dac31f23fb8bd4c5e498a68ebd4ca4e1430.body: Index operators are super slow with linked lists. This came up in profiling the parsing, iterating sequentially using iterator is much faster.

891b17d5dba314535f71a79f7c825d146608cedf.body:
Due to a single error, _is_line_in_region was previously iterating over the color highlighting for the entire document repeatedly for each line in the script.

This is now fixed, which should make the editor much faster with large scripts.

(cherry picked from commit 57306bf0e3c05a889a01f58fed6a8d4425630439)

57306bf0e3c05a889a01f58fed6a8d4425630439.body:
Due to a single error, _is_line_in_region was previously iterating over the color highlighting for the entire document repeatedly for each line in the script.

This is now fixed, which should make the editor much faster with large scripts.

5aca56bcd4532295b5fbad680e26330158b4aca0.body:
The previously used file sharing api was restricted after Android N causing the engine to crash whenever used on devices running Android N or higher.

(cherry picked from commit b04c9a71f47a5dec7ed146122c39a775ad877d4c)

b04c9a71f47a5dec7ed146122c39a775ad877d4c.body: The previously used file sharing api was restricted after Android N causing the engine to crash whenever used on devices running Android N or higher.

5bfecf1921a0a57be6add5c34e83349d86111b7a.summary: Correct URL pointing to tween cheatsheet
5bfecf1921a0a57be6add5c34e83349d86111b7a.body:

has been changed to point to the same file in the `3.5` branch of the
`godot-docs` repo.
